sub_title: Freelance Consultant Airline & Aviation, Experienced Professional
summary:
I am a positive, proactive and results driven sales and marketing, commercial, ground operations, airport services professional with 15+ years experience of profitable business growth and significant expertise in customer solutions. An innovative, collaborative, strategic thinker with strong leadership skills and passionate about team and individual growth and development. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving proficiency. Global mindset with multi-cultural experience developed in Uzbekistan, Afghanistan, The Netherlands and Turkey. Possess excellent interpersonal, communication and negotiating skills as well as the ability to develop and maintain mutually beneficial relationship with key stakeholders. Participates in continuous learning and has over 70 vocational training certificates in related field.     

Core competencies include:
- Strong business acumen with ability to cut cost, whilst ensuring growth and development through implementation of cutting edge solutions to take advantage of business opportunities 

- Astute analytical skills in weaving knowledge of market trends to solve problems creatively whilst providing strategic visioning with a buy in from internal and external stakeholders
